title_teim: The seventh annual induction ceremony. 1992. Awards Reel #40 1/16/92
title_ssm: The seventh annual induction ceremony. 1992. Awards Reel #40 1/16/92
title_si: The seventh annual induction ceremony. 1992. Awards Reel #40 1/16/92
summary_teim: The conclusion of the acceptance speech for Bill Graham followed by a grand finale performance featuring all the inductees and their presenters.
summary_ssm: The conclusion of the acceptance speech for Bill Graham followed by a grand finale performance featuring all the inductees and their presenters.
contents_teim: Family members of Bill Graham accept award – Carlos Santana performs – All inductees and presenters perform Green onions; Soul man; Big river; Get Rhythm; Dust my broom; Shout; All along the watchtower; Purple haze; When something is wrong with my baby.
contents_ssm: Family members of Bill Graham accept award – Carlos Santana performs – All inductees and presenters perform Green onions; Soul man; Big river; Get Rhythm; Dust my broom; Shout; All along the watchtower; Purple haze; When something is wrong with my baby.

abstract_ssm: At 1992 Induction Ceremony -- (cont.) Family members of Bill Graham accept award -- Carlos Santana speaks about Bill Graham -- I Love You Much Too Much (Carlos Santana) -- Green Onions; Soul Man; Big River; Get Rhythm; Dust my Broom; Shout; All Along the Watchtower; Purple Haze; When Something is Wrong with my Baby (Bobby Blue Bland, Little Richard, Johnny Cash, The Edge, Neil Young, The Isley Brothers, Sam Moore, Keith Richards, Booker T. and the M.G.'s, John Fogerty, The Yardbirds, Noel Redding, Jimmy Page, Jon Popper, Carlos Santana)
